snippet: Many thought Rice received preferential treatment by prosecutors after punching his fiancée, but in most cases, domestic assaults do not lead to jail time.
abstract: Many who are outraged over video footage of former Baltimore Ravens star Ray Rice assaulting his fiancee feel that he was given preferential treatment by prosecutors, but outcome was in fact typical of domestic violence cases; such assaults rarely lead to jail time or serious legal consequences, especially when they involve first-time offenders like Rice.
lead_paragraph: Many thought Rice received preferential treatment by prosecutors after punching his fiancée, but in most cases, domestic assaults do not lead to jail time.

headline.main: Ray Rice Case Draws Attention to a Crime Often Obscured
headline.print_headline: Rice Case Draws Attention to a Crime Often Obscured
